text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that Regulation 4(2) of the Electricity at Work Regulations 1989 requires electrical systems to be maintained \u201cso as may be necessary to prevent danger.\u201d The candidate answer mentions the Electricity at Work Regulations 1989 (EAWR) in Section 1(D) and states it \u201cRequires electrical systems/equipment to be constructed/maintained to prevent danger.\u201d However, it does not explicitly quote or reference Regulation 4(2) or the exact phrasing \u201cso as may be necessary to prevent danger\u201d as required by the criterion.", "criterion_id": "bfc9f422-a764-42bc-bc7b-8e1c9fc91ec0"}
